entry.title: Offsec Web Expert OSWE Review
entry.summary: Introduction After completing my OSEP exam in June, I didn’t expect to take another Offsec certication so soon. But, my team won the Asia Pacific Cyberattack Response Challenge 2023 and we were awarded Offsec vouchers as prizes. Thanks to Cyber8lab and Offsec for sponsoring these prizes! The Offensive Security web Expert (OSWE) certification, formerly known as Advanced Web Attacks and Explo...
